content: As Sreeni stated GAAP book value per share declined 27.8% to $10.63 as of September 30, 2022, down from $14.73 as of June 30, 2022. Economic book value, which includes valuing all securitization obligations to their fair value was $12.94 per share on a diluted basis on September 30, 2022, down 19.4% from $16.05 per share as of June 30, 2020, 22. The deal included 407 loans with a weighted average coupon of 5.22%, and average credit score of $730, loan-to-value of 75.1% and a debt-to-income ratio of 32.1%. We have unpaid principal balance of $1.3 billion of residential whole loans at a fair value of $1.1 billion; $1.1 billion of residential mortgage loans and securitization trust; and $1.1 billion of RMBS, including $65.4 million of retained AOMT securities from the pre-IPO securitization.
